EmailTemplate.name: SGN_BRD_1606_MRT_SavourPassportWinner.Email - Winner eDM
EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulation! We’ve got a bottle with your name on it.​
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Having trouble viewing this email? View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]>.
<[[http://www.martell.com/en-sg/]]>
<[[https://www.facebook.com/Martell.sg/videos/2041326719424981/]]>
<[[#]]> <[[#]]>
Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
Thank you for completing the Martell Gourmet Passport at Savour. You’ve won a complimentary Martell Cordon Bleu, the cognac for true connoisseurs.
WE'VE GOT
A BOTTLE WITH
YOUR NAME
ON IT.
Kindly collect your prize at Pernod Ricard, Great World City West Tower, 1 Kim Seng Promenade #11-09/12, Singapore 237994. Receiving hours are from 10am - 12pm, or 2 pm - 6pm Monday to Friday until the 30th of June 2016. Please prepare appropriate identification.
<[[https://www.facebook.com/Martell.sg/videos/2041326719424981/]]>
Elegant, mellow, and complex, the Cordon Bleu is ideal for special occasions. With a sustained finish of fruit and spice notes, there’s much to discover with each sip.
<[[https://www.facebook.com/Martell.sg/videos/2041326719424981/]]>
*Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Aenean felis dui, commodo et lectus eget, pharetra facilisis urna. Donec at justo sem. Praesent aliquam dolor sed sollicitudin ullamcorper. Proin lacus velit, pellentesque eu metus in, suscipit molestie risus.
